languages.text: "В твоих словах слышен почти религиозный трепет".
"There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."
languages.original_text: "В твоих словах слышен почти религиозный трепет".

traits.locale_text: "There is reverence in your words that feels almost religious."
"There is reverence in your words that feels almost religious."
"There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."
"There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."
"There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."
"There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."

languages.text: 「君の言葉には、ほとんど信仰にも近いような敬虔さがある」
languages.original_text: "There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."

traits.locale_text: 「君の言葉には、ほとんど信仰にも近いような敬虔さがある」

languages.text: "Die Verehrung in Euren Worten wirkt beinahe religiös."
languages.original_text: "There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."

traits.locale_text: "Die Verehrung in Euren Worten wirkt beinahe religiös."

languages.text: « Je perçois une véritable révérence dans vos paroles, elles ont une ferveur quasiment religieuse. »
languages.original_text: "There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."

traits.locale_text: « Je perçois une véritable révérence dans vos paroles, elles ont une ferveur quasiment religieuse. »

languages.text: «Hay una devoción en sus palabras que casi parece religiosa».
languages.original_text: "There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."

traits.locale_text: «Hay una devoción en sus palabras que casi parece religiosa».

languages.text: “你的话语中带着近乎信仰的崇敬。”
languages.original_text: "There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."

traits.locale_text: “你的话语中带着近乎信仰的崇敬。”

languages.text: "Sözlerinde neredeyse dinî hissettiren bir hürmet var."
languages.original_text: "There is a reverence in your words that feels almost religious."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerinde neredeyse dinî hissettiren bir hürmet var."
